TITLE: Episode 124 - The Dangers of Pornography with Heather Nielson
DESCRIPTION: This week, we are joined by Heather Nielson from Fight the Beast, an organization that helps people who are addicted to sex, pornography, or any other sexual addiction. We're talking the dangers of pornography in your life, in the lives of those who make it, and what it has to do with sex trafficking. Join us as we discuss this often neglected or demonized topic.
